message: Let's make a deal quickly, Bob. This offer is good for both of us, but it won't last forever!
Come on, Alice. This is a fair offer considering the inflation!
Bob, let's be reasonable. The clock is ticking and we're both losing out. This is my final offer!
Alice, you said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle. Don't let the inflation eat away our money!
